name: EXT_ELIG_STATUS_1
description: This table contains the query line results from external eligibility queries to RxHub. Related external eligibility information is stored in the EXT_ELIG_STATUS table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: The unique contact serial number for this contact. This number is unique across all patient encounters in your system. If you use IntraConnect this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the associated external eligibility query in this query contact.  Together with PAT_ENC_CSN_ID, this forms the foreign key to the EXT_ELIG_STATUS table.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple external formulary queue lines that are associated with the external eligibility query from the EXT_ELIG_STATUS table.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique, internal contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of the contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CM_CT_OWNER_ID
columns.description: The Community ID (CID) of the instance that owns this contact. This is only populated if you use IntraConnect.

columns.name: EXT_FORM_Q_LINE
columns.description: This column contains the external formulary query line information.
